title: Data Pipeline ETL
prompt:
Design and implement data pipeline for [TASK]:

Requirements:
1. Data sources and extraction
2. Transformation logic (cleaning, validation, enrichment)
3. Loading to target system
4. Orchestration (Airflow/Prefect)
5. Data quality checks
6. Error handling and retry logic
7. Performance optimization
8. Monitoring and alerting
9. Testing suite

Technology Stack:
- Orchestration: [Airflow/Prefect]
- Processing: [Pandas/Spark]
- Storage: [PostgreSQL/BigQuery/S3]

Provide complete pipeline code and configuration.
example: Build ETL pipeline for customer data analytics
